Description: ESP is a premier guitar maker...and this beautiful ESP M-1 neck-through guitar is a perfect example of their 'custom shop look and feel' at standard pricing. The color is the most beautiful and deep candy apple red I have seen...and with a single hum bucker design with a powerful EMG pickup...this guitar can play any style of music you prefer...from classic rock to metal. This guitar is part of a private collection from an old customer...with very little playtime...the pictures speak for themselves. You will need to have the guitar setup to your personal play style after arrival.
Title: ESP M-1 in Candy Red with Hardshell Case
ConditionDescription: A beautiful ESP M-1 guitar in candy red with original hardshell case and whammy bar....in beautiful condition with very little play time. After arrival...you will need to setup the guitar to your personal tastes.NOTICE: For some reason this guitar does NOT appear candy apple red in my photos...it looks copper...but the color is candy apple red...sorry for the confusion!
